 Called when a generic motion event is dispatched to a widget.

Detailed Description

A callback to be invoked when a generic motion event is dispatched.

The callback will be invoked before the generic motion event is given to the widget.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool gaia::core::OnGenericMotionListener::onGenericMotion ( Widget *  w,
const MotionEvent &  event 
) [virtual]

Called when a generic motion event is dispatched to a widget.

This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the target widget.

Parameters:
wThe widget the touch event has been dispatched to.
eventThe MotionEvent object containing full information about the event.
Returns:
True if the listener has consumed the event, false otherwise.
